# annotatAR's blog

Produced for the Fall 2015 [Capstone Design Studio](https://canvas.harvard.edu/courses/4308) at Harvard Extension School's Information Technology ALM program.

## Blog framework

The project blog uses the [Jekyll](http://jekyllrb.com) framework [Poole](http://demo.getpoole.com), created by [Mark Otto](https://github.com/mdo) - [@mdo](https://twitter.com/mdo), open sourced under the [MIT license](LICENSE.md).
